com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core

Interface I18NBindingBuilder.FirstStep

  • Enclosing class:
    I18NBindingBuilder

    public static interface I18NBindingBuilder.FirstStep
    First mandory step to generate a StringBinding.

    This Interface allowed the developer to choose one of the 2 choises:

    • First the usage from a funcation from type Callable<String>,
    • or second the usage from a key with optional arguments which will be injected into the value.
    Since:
    0.1.0-PRERELEASE
    Version:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Naoghuman
    See Also:
    Callable, StringBinding

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      I18NBindingBuilder.LastStep callable(Callable<String> function)
      Setter for the developers choose to generate a StringBinding with a function from type Callable<String>.
      I18NBindingBuilder.SecondStep key(String key)
      Setter for the developers choose to generate a StringBinding with a key.

    • Method Detail

      • callable

        I18NBindingBuilder.LastStep callable(Callable<String> function)
        Setter for the developers choose to generate a StringBinding with a function from type Callable<String>.
        Parameters:
        function - which will be used to generate a StringBinding.
        Returns:
        the last step in this fluent builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is NULL.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        Callable, StringBinding

      • key

        I18NBindingBuilder.SecondStep key(String key)
        Setter for the developers choose to generate a StringBinding with a key.

        Hint:
        The value from the given key will be loaded from the previous configured ResourceBundle through the fluent builder I18NResourceBundleBuilder.

        Parameters:
        key - which value should be loaded from the ResourceBundle.
        Returns:
        the second step in this fluent builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if key is NULL.
        IllegalArgumentException - if key is EMPTY.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NResourceBundleBuilder, ResourceBundle, StringBinding
